snippet: Emergency responders answering a call on Sunday found the family dead in their apartment, a Fire Department spokesman said.
abstract: Police are investigating stabbing deaths of Deisy Garcia and her two young daughters in Jamaica, Queens.
lead_paragraph: Emergency responders answering a call on Sunday found the family dead in their apartment, a Fire Department spokesman said.

headline.main: Woman and 2 Daughters in Queens Are Found Stabbed to Death at Home
headline.print_headline: Woman and 2 Daughters in Queens Are Found Stabbed to Death at Home
